definitions.definition: An alcoholic, often sparkling (carbonated) beverage made from fermented apples; hard cider; apple cider

A non-alcoholic still beverage consisting of the juice of early-harvest apples, usually unfiltered and still containing pulp; apple cider; sweet cider (without pulp such a beverage is called apple juice).
definitions.example: She liked an aged cider. He liked a harder cider.

definitions.definition: A non-alcoholic carbonated beverage made from apples.
(in Korea) A non-alcoholic drink, normally carbonated; equivalent to soft drink.
A cup, glass or serving of any of these beverages.
